forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle breeze that stirs with notes of the Pacific. The forecast whispers promises of mostly sunny skies, with the sun already striving to break through a thin layer of stubborn fog. While visibility remains generally good, the hint of clarity reveals the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge and the bustling city. Yet, there’s a soft presence of marine air lurking near the bay, a reminder of the coast's ever-changing moods. As the sun climbs, the temperature will hover around the comfortable high of 69, accompanied by a mild west-southwest wind that dances through the streets.

As the day unfolds towards afternoon, it may flirt with 67, inviting an ease that is distinctly San Franciscan. The evening will usher in a gentle embrace of clouds, settling into a cozy low of around 60. For those venturing out today, layers are your ally—a light sweater or jacket will serve well against the afternoon chill and evening fog. Stroll through the vibrant streets or savor a moment in one of the city’s quaint cafés, enjoying the juxtaposition of urban energy and coastal tranquility that defines this remarkable place.
